tariffs.title: Partner
tariffs.description: Participation in an unlimited number of procurement procedures
tariffs.extra_comment: No fee from a winner of the procurement procedure

tariffs.title: One Procedure
tariffs.extra_comment: No fee from a winner of the procurement procedure

tariffs.title: Quick Start
tariffs.description: Participation in procurements in less than 2 hours
tariffs.extra_comment: Includes quick accreditation/registration and participation in one procedure

tariffs.title: Procedure for SME only
tariffs.description: Procedure only for small and medium enterprises in accordance with the Art. 3.4 of Federal Law No. 223
tariffs.price_comment: of the initial maximum price of the contract, but not exceeding 5,000 rubles (excluding VAT)
tariffs.extra_comment: Fee from a participant, with which a contract is concluded based on the procurement results (including participants that evade the conclusion of a contract) The funds are debited from a special account

disclamer.text:
1. All terms and definitions of the Tariff plan are used in accordance with the present Regulations of work on the Electronic Trading Platform TEK-Torg JSC in the Section “Procurement procedures of Rosneft”, unless otherwise defined in the Tariff.
  2. The date of access to the Procurement procedures on the ETP is the date of tariff activation, except for “Quick start” tariff, according to which the date of access to the Procurement procedures is the date of accreditation on the ETP.
  3. Termination date of access to the Procurement procedures on the ETP:
    • For “Partner” tariffs is the respective day of the last month of access to the procurement procedures on the ETP;

    • For “One procedure” tariffs:

      The earliest date: the corresponding day of the last month of access to the ETP procurement procedures or the date of submission of an application for participation in the procurement procedure.

  4. “Quick Start” tariff include:
    • Reviewing of accreditation application within 2 hours;
    • Access to the Procurement Procedure on the ETP with the possibility of crediting the money to the personal account within 5 days from the start date of access to the Procurement Procedures to pay for the Operator’s services.
  5. Tariffs activated before the date of entry into force of new tariff plans are valid on the conditions specified in the Regulations and the Tariff plan in force on the date of activation of the tariff.
